short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Catalog items on Amazon and create a link with ALL all items into a cart

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to give your followers a link with MULTIPLE items to place into an Amazon cart?  The Amazon Cart Link Generator (ACLG) extension helps you build a collection of items and generates a URL link of an Amazon cart with your items that can be used anywhere in your content. 

1. Navigate to the item in Amazon (if you just installed the plugin, refresh the page)
2. Click on the extension to open the panel.
3. "Add Item" to your collection. Repeat until you are done.
4. (optional) Add your own amazon affiliate tag. Leaving blank helps us fund our efforts.
5. Click on the blue shopping cart button to copy the link for your content!

That's it!

Update: 3/6/23
- another fixed a tagging issue and adjusted to new Amazon affiliate API
